channel.title: Theory
channel.description: This is a theory I have been working on, and gotten it to work before. I was wondering what you guys thought of this. Instead of soft/hard modding the Xbox 360 to be able to get free games, couldn't we use the programs out there to put it onto a USB Drive that was configured by the Xbox, after Resigining it with out XBL Gamertag, and XB ID? I have done this to test the theory with the Halo 3 Heroic Map-Pack, and it worked after a few tries. What is your opinion on resigning xbox 360 game add-ons, or such with your Gamertag ID, and Xbox 360 ID to pirate them.

item.title: Theory
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

pure2ownage:

Buy a 20GB HDD to use, 8GB USB may not be enough in some cases.

For the games that i play, a 8GB flash-drive will be plenty, since i have a 120GB HDD on my 360. I just transfer stuff to it.

Read full topic

item.title: Theory
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:

Buy a 20GB HDD to use, 8GB USB may not be enough in some cases.

item.title: Theory
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

mandood77:

you want a simple map pack, i want a freaking game! well, i mean lumines live… is it possible to do the same procedure to install that?

I am starting small, then going larger, so if someone can help me on getting a copy of the “Mythic map-pack 2” then I will find a game and test it from there.

The Reaper X:

Uhm, isn’t this soft modding…?

Possibly, there is nothing about using this method to actually get map-packs, or add-ons for games. Well, at least from what I could find. Everybody wants to burn the disk and go from there, when I have a large enough HDD, so I am doing this via 8GB USB, and just transfering to the 360 like that.

Read full topic

item.title: Theory
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Also, just to fore-warn everybody, the Helo 3 heroic map-pack is free. That’s why i tried it with that. The reason i ask, is because i want to try it with a map-pack that you must charge for. Trying to get someone that has the Mythic map-pack 2 that is willing to copy it onto a USB and share that with me.

Read full topic

item.title: Theory
item.dc:creator: @mandood77 mandood77
item.description:
@mandood77 wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:5, topic:352499”][quote author=mandood77 link=topic=448852.msg3293827#msg3293827 date=1280801009]

could this be possible with a ps3? considering you got it once, it sounds completely possible, but it also sounds like a fun way to get banned.
[/quote]for a ps3, its more likely to happen than on a xbox. the ps3 can read xbox games, program it with the usb, and voila, you have 2 consoles at once.

This means they share the exact same “system remote” configuration. I am going to look into this further, because it seems pointless if you have no XBL Gamertag.[/quote] if you can make the configuration and be sucessful, your a freaking genius, but i say good luck to that because it doesn’t look so simple as it sounds…

Read full topic

item.title: Theory
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

TabbyKiller:

I was also thinking, was it possible to rent a game and save it to your hard drive copy the game to another disc and run it off the copied disk?wallhack ect.?

Actually I think that would work, as I play Bootleg DVD’s in my xbox all the time. I think the Xbox requires less modding that people want to admit to make work how we want. As long as we use the correct programs to burn the DVD’s, i see no reason why that shouldn’t work.

Read full topic

item.title: Theory
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

I was also thinking, was it possible to rent a game and save it to your hard drive copy the game to another disc and run it off the copied disk?

Okay guys. I was thinking of buying a jtaged xbox, but when you receive the xbox does it come with a aimbot, wallhack ect.?

Read full topic

item.title: Theory
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“mandood77, post:3, topic:352499”][quote author=reyx7 link=topic=448852.msg3293816#msg3293816 date=1280799905]
could this be possible with a ps3? considering you got it once, it sounds completely possible, but it also sounds like a fun way to get banned.
[/quote]for a ps3, its more likely to happen than on a xbox. the ps3 can read xbox games, program it with the usb, and voila, you have 2 consoles at once.[/quote]
This means they share the exact same “system remote” configuration. I am going to look into this further, because it seems pointless if you have no XBL Gamertag.

Read full topic
